channel.title: I need a code for nulls
channel.description:
Ok, i need a code when a admin picks up a null, he doesn't pick it up, a message shows telling him "You Can't pickup Nulls!"
Any help?

item.title: I need a code for nulls
item.dc:creator: @delicious delicious
item.description:
@delicious wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:3, topic:326101”][quote author=delicious link=topic=422517.msg3101586#msg3101586 date=1263749533]
You would have to know every null’s id code.

It would be like

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pickup 500")
{
   sM("You can't pickup nulls!")
}

True. Just do that.

It’s way too much work. Thats why it hasn’t been done before!

[/quote][/quote]
No, you would just have to check if the item they’re picking up is null before performing any further procedures.

Read full topic
item.source: I need a code for nulls

item.title: I need a code for nulls
item.dc:creator: @spy_man47 spy man47
item.description:
@spy_man47 wrote:

I mean when some 1 picks a null in the server he doesn’t pick it a message tells him you can’t pickup a null!

Read full topic

item.title: I need a code for nulls
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

I do not completely understand what you are asking , But iff im right why dont you just delete all the nulls from your client
class.8

Or you could turn the id of all the items that are nulled to the same item id and then add a code into your server client.java, for when somebody picks up the item it will count for all of them.

But im not sure

Read full topic
